mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_account, password, user_email, user_name, user_image, create_time, update_time, last_login_time, status, birthday, telephone, role_id) values (#{userId}, #{userAccount}, #{password}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userImage}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{status}, #{birthday}, #{telephone}, #{roleId});
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password}, user_name=#{userName}, user_image=#{userImage}, birthday=#{birthday}, user_email=#{userEmail}, telephone=#{telephone}, update_time=#{update_date}, status=#{status}, last_login_time=#{lastLoginTime} where user_id = #{user_account};
